content: The tango dance originated in the late 19th century in the border region between Argentina and which neighboring country?

The tango dance originated in the late 19th century in the border region between Argentina and Uruguay. The dance evolved from a blend of African, European, and indigenous influences in the working-class neighborhoods of Buenos Aires, Argentina, and Montevideo, Uruguay. Today, tango is enjoyed worldwide and has become a significant part of international dance culture.
